quagga.input.subject: enovate update
quagga.input.xto: Barbara N Gray, Jeffrey T Hodge
quagga.input.body:
Barbara, here is the document I discussed concerning some of the Chicago 
stuff.  Jeff, I don't know if you have received this from Gregg all ready.

Kay
---------------------- Forwarded by Kay Mann/Corp/Enron on 10/21/2000 12:34 
PM ---------------------------
   
	
	
	From:  Gregg Penman                           10/13/2000 02:19 PM
	

To: David W Delainey/HOU/ECT@ECT, t.patrick@pecorp.com
cc: Janet R Dietrich/HOU/ECT@ECT, w.morrow@pecorp.com, j.luebbers@pecorp.com, 
Laura Luce/Corp/Enron@Enron, Richard Tomaski/Corp/Enron@Enron, 
t.hermann@pecorp.com (bcc: Kay Mann/Corp/Enron)

Subject: enovate update

Attached is the weekly status update for the business setup of enovate.  
There are no significant updates to last week's report.   Please call me with 
any questions.

Gregg
